historical:
Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 18-223 repealed subsec. (b), which had read as follows:

"(b) This chapter shall apply upon the inclusion of its fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan."

Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) repeal of section 802(b) of D.C. Law 18-209, see § 7005 of Fiscal Year 2011 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-463, July 2, 2010, 57 DCR 6542).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 18-209, see notes following § 38-821.01.

For Law 18-223, see notes following § 38-103.

DC CODE § 38-828.02

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Subchapter II of this chapter shall apply as of August 1, 2010.
